extendedInfo.description: **ATTENTION** Need help installing this widget?  Please read below.Spice up your home screen with a Halloween doo-dad, a widget for your Android device. Doo-dads are designed to add a little bling to your screen without changing your background. Do you have the perfect wallpaper, but you think it's missing a little something to set it off? That's where doo-dads come in. Doo-dads come in various sizes and put very little drain on your battery.To install this doo-dad, follow these instructions:1. Purchase, download, and install the app2. Go to a blank area on your home screen and long-press3. When the menu comes up, select Widgets4. Look for the doo-dad and select itYour doo-dad should appear on the screen. To move it around, just long-press the image until you see it increase in size; then move it to where you want it. Everybody's screen needs a doo-dad!Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by Google and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 3.0 Attribution License.keywords: droid, trick or treat, halloween, doo-dads, doodads, dodads, decoration, graffiti, graphics, awesome, art, sticker, decal, eye candy, personalization, dml, dark matter lab

reviews.title: No trick this is a treat.
reviews.comment: Dark Matter Lab makes bootiful widgets! Shame some of their better ones are no longer available. Motorola Razr HD.
reviews.author: Yanwyn Kirby
